title: Chaps Home Cage, ¾” Diameter Window Curtain Rod and Finial Set, Oil Rubbed Bronze, Adjustable 66"-120"
features: FASHIONABLE & FUNCTIONAL: The Chaps Home Cage Curtain Rod and Finial Set offers a modern look for your windows in any room.
SET INCLUDES: One (1) three-piece adjustable rod, two (2) finials, three (3) 2.75” depth projection brackets, and installation hardware with instructions.
ADJUSTABLE STRUCTURE: Adjustable length curtain rod extends from 66 to 120 inches. Accommodates a range of window widths.
FINIALS: Includes two (2) sturdy, iron cage finials that measure 2.52" diameter and 3.11" long cage finials to add an elegant finishing touch and uniform appearance to your windows.

STURDY & DURABLE RODS: Rod measures 3/4" diameter and can be used to hang different fabrics and types of curtains including grommet top curtain panels, drapes with rod pockets and back tabs. Each rod can hold up to 20 pounds of weight.
description: The Chaps Home Cage Curtain Rod and Finial Set offers a fashionable accent for windows in any room. The 3/4" diameter adjustable steel rod will accommodate a variety of window sizes. It has a 20 lb. capacity that will support most curtains, from airy sheers to weighted blackout curtain panels and drapes designed with various tops. The matching 2.52" diameter sturdy, iron cage finials will keep your window curtain panels secure on the rod while providing a modern look.
